fields.name: Lawrence Mbugua Njuguna
fields.title: Junior Developer | Turning Ideas Into Impactful Solutions
fields.bio: I'm a junior developer exploring code one step at a time and building projects that work and look good. Passionate about leveraging technology to empower individuals and communities in Africa, I aim to promote transparency, good governance, and equal opportunities.
fields.location: Systems Reengineered Limited, PQMX+857, Azure Towers, Nairobi
